DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test hypothesis HumaPen Memoir memory function , use 24 week prandial insulin injection achieve superior glycemic control , compare conventional HumaPen Luxura without memory function .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Effect 2 Pen Devices HbA1c
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes mellitus receive least 3 prandial injection per day shortacting analogue insulin Insulin pump therapy receive premixed insulin preparation
